alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 2:50PM EDT until May 12 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... East central Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 150 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southwest of Marianna, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marianna, Cottondale, Alford, Steele City, Gilberts Mill, Kynesville, Ridgetop, Star, Round Lake, Simsville, Cottondale Airport and Compass Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
